trans-unit.source: Provides the base class for elements of a <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Fornisce la classe base per gli elementi di un <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo.

trans-unit.source: The .NET Framework supplies two specialized classes that derive from DataGridViewElement: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, which represents individual elements, and <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>, which represents a series of grouped subelements.
trans-unit.target: .NET Framework fornisce due classi specializzate che derivano da DataGridViewElement: <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>, che rappresenta i singoli elementi, e <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand>, che rappresenta una serie di sottoelementi raggruppati.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewBand> </xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCell>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement"> </xref> classe.

trans-unit.source: This constructor sets the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A> property to `null`.
trans-unit.target: Questo costruttore imposta la <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A>proprietà `null`.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElement.DataGridView%2A>

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control associated with this element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo associato a questo elemento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref> control that contains this element.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref> controllo che contiene questo elemento.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Il valore predefinito è <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Called when the element is associated with a different <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Chiamata eseguita quando l'elemento è associato a un altro <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellClick"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentClick"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentDoubleClick"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellContentDoubleClick"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.CellValueChanged"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridView.DataError"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Raises the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"></xref> event.
trans-unit.target: Genera il <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.Control.MouseWheel"> </xref> evento.

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"></xref> that contains the event data.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.MouseEventArgs"> </xref> che contiene i dati dell'evento.

trans-unit.source: Gets the user interface (UI) state of the element.
trans-unit.target: Ottiene lo stato dell'interfaccia utente dell'elemento.

trans-unit.source: The states specified by the <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates> values are enforced by the UI but may be programmatically overruled.
trans-unit.target: Gli stati specificati per il <xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>valori vengono applicati dall'interfaccia utente, ma possono essere rifiutati a livello di codice.</xref:System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates>

trans-unit.source: A bitwise combination of the <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"></xref> values representing the state.
trans-unit.target: Combinazione bit per bit di <xref href="System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewElementStates"> </xref> valori che rappresenta lo stato.
